definition: hope and expectation/to anticipate/to look forward to/to await expectantly
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
to hope for/to long for/to expect

sentences.english: If you expect the rainbow, you must first be used to experiencing storm.
sentences.chinese: 如果你期盼彩虹，那就應習慣承受風雨。

sentences.english: The quick, decisive victory that Napoleon expected never happened.
sentences.chinese: 拿破崙期盼着的速決速勝遲遲沒有發生。

sentences.english: We decided to find out what people want out of their lives this spring.
sentences.chinese: 我們決定要找出今春人們對生活有什麼期盼。

sentences.english: Revive Wuhan, be person of 60 million Hubei expect.
sentences.chinese: 復興武漢，是六千萬湖北人的期盼。

sentences.english: The resulting response to the light has not been as effusive as expected.
sentences.chinese: 對於光的迴應並不如期盼的熱情洋溢。

sentences.english: I wait all day just hoping for one more minute with you, but if has meat to be, it will be.
sentences.chinese: 我整日期盼與你多待一分鐘，但天意難違，命該如此。

sentences.english: Expecting all the gifts that wise men bring.
sentences.chinese: 期盼着明眼的男人們送上禮物。

sentences.english: You had my heart of stone, not in the full moon night languish.
sentences.chinese: 你煉就了我的鐵石心腸，不會在月圓的夜苦苦期盼。

sentences.english: Is that such an unreasonable thing to hope for?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，期盼這樣的事情又算不算“不可理喻”呢？

sentences.english: I hope for going to college.
Agnus:So, you've come, just as I'd expected.
sentences.chinese: 你來了，就像我期盼的那樣。

sentences.english: They should all know what your expectations are from the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 這樣他們就可以知道從開始就知道你的期盼。

sentences.english: What is this almost eager anticipation of death?
sentences.chinese: 這種對死亡的熱切期盼到底是什麼呢？

sentences.english: I look forward to seeing how people combine them.
sentences.chinese: 我期盼着看到人們如何將它們進行合併。

sentences.english: Every year, people look forward to the Perseid meteor shower.
sentences.chinese: 每年，人們都很期盼英仙座流星雨。

sentences.english: We expect to manage contemporary Taiwan's art and further develop to international art markets.
sentences.chinese: 期盼能落實經營當代臺灣藝術，進而放眼國際。

definition: to expect/to look forward to/anxious for sth/to hope (to get sth)
to hope for/to look forward to
to long for/to look forward to/longing/vision for the future
to hope for/to long for/to expect
to long for/to crave for/to greatly desire
to yearn for/to look forward to
